name: mssql_up
description: UP Status - whether the MSSQL server is up

name: mssql_product_version
description: Instance version (Major.Minor)

name: mssql_instance_local_time
description: Number of seconds since epoch on local instance

name: mssql_connections
description: Number of active connections

name: mssql_client_connections
description: Number of active client connections

name: mssql_deadlocks
description: Number of lock requests per second that resulted in a deadlock since last restart

name: mssql_user_errors
description: Number of user errors per second since last restart

name: mssql_kill_connection_errors
description: Number of kill connection errors per second since last restart

name: mssql_database_state
description: Database states: 0=ONLINE 1=RESTORING 2=RECOVERING 3=RECOVERY_PENDING 4=SUSPECT 5=EMERGENCY 6=OFFLINE 7=COPYING 10=OFFLINE_SECONDARY

name: mssql_log_growths
description: Total number of times the transaction log for the database has been expanded since last restart

name: mssql_database_filesize
description: Physical sizes of files used by database in KB (type: 0=rows, 1=log, 2=filestream, 3=n/a, 4=fulltext)

name: mssql_page_read_total
description: Page reads per second

name: mssql_page_write_total
description: Page writes per second

name: mssql_page_life_expectancy
description: Indicates the minimum number of seconds a page will stay in the buffer pool without references (should be above 300 seconds)

name: mssql_lazy_write_total
description: Lazy writes per second

name: mssql_page_checkpoint_total
description: Checkpoint pages per second

name: mssql_io_stall
description: Wait time (milliseconds) of stall since last restart

name: mssql_io_stall_total
description: Total wait time (milliseconds) of stall since last restart

name: mssql_batch_requests
description: Number of Transact-SQL command batches received per second (high batch requests indicate good throughput)

name: mssql_transactions
description: Number of transactions started for the database per second

name: mssql_page_fault_count
description: Number of page faults since last restart

name: mssql_memory_utilization_percentage
description: Percentage of memory utilization

name: mssql_total_physical_memory_kb
description: Total physical memory in KB

name: mssql_available_physical_memory_kb
description: Available physical memory in KB

name: mssql_total_page_file_kb
description: Total page file in KB

name: mssql_available_page_file_kb
description: Available page file in KB
